properties.name: DynasTEA
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  1390 Pacific Ave, San Francisco, CA This place is a gem! That said, this is not the place if you\'\'re looking for a boisterous get together. Tea is meant to be tasted with all your senses here and that calls for a quiet environment. The perfect place for quiet time alone. (adagio.com)

properties.name: Le Petit Robert
properties.description: Posted by Tanabutler  2300 Polk Street, San Francisco, CA, 94109Le Petit Robert 415-922-8100 2300 Polk Street San Francisco CA 94109 Le Petit Robert is a sophisticated neighborhood bistro in the heart of San Francisco\'s Russian Hill. The restaurant, located on upper Polk Street , is an area, which is fast becoming known as "little France". With French antique stores, boutiques and Le Petit Robert\'s sister bakery/cafÃ© , La Boulange de Polk, next door, this is a wonderful neighborhood to walk, shop, enjoy a full meal or sit and relax with an expresso or a glass of wine. Under the direction of Chef and Owner Robert Cubberly, Le Petit Robert serves authentic French bistro fare with an emphasis on fresh ingredients acquired from some of California\'s best produce farms and artisanal purveyors. Robert\'s menu, which changes seasonally, is enjoyed with a number of reasonably priced wines from both the old and new worlds. Most selections are available by the glass or carafe.

properties.name: Love at First Bite
properties.description: Posted by Baostar1510 Walnut Street, Berkeley, CA, 94709Deborah Im ditched the bloodthirsty world of corporate law for the fuzzier terrain of cupcakes, cookies, and bread puddings. The shop carries indulgences like PB Affair (Reese\'s-topped chocolate cupcakes), Mud Pie (chocolate cupcakes with mocha frosting and Oreo bits), and Red Hot Love (red velvet cupcakes with cream cheese frosting).

properties.name: Swan's Oyster Depot
properties.description: Posted by Whysteriastar  The BEST seafood place in San Francisco, real narrow inside, always a line out the door. Try the clam chowder, the bread, the salads, the oysters, the homemade horseradish, everything is amazing.

properties.name: Teacake Bake Shop
properties.description: Posted by Baostar  5615 Bay Street, Emeryville, CAThis warm and homey, the adorable pink Emeryville shop uses quality ingredients, like Belgian chocolate and sweet cream butter, turning out small batches of goodies throughout the day so everything is straight out of the oven.
